name: Diapers
description:
Diapers
Client lives in a 4-room HDB flat with her elderly parents, husband and their four young children, aged 10, 5, 4, and 1. The family is currently facing financial challenges due to bankruptcy and the monthly household income is insufficient to meet the family's basic needs. Family is seeking support for essential items such as Drypers Superdry Pants XL and Drypers Superdry Pants XXL for their young children. For further liaison, kindly WhatsApp me at 98598768, I will respond from 9am to 5pm on weekdays. Thank you very much!

name: Fridge
description:
Hi, I am looking for a fridge for a homeless elderly lady who have just moved back to her house at Bukit Batok. She is currently retired and she is relying on financial assistance from MSF Social Service Office. She had been rough sleeping outside and recently went back home after we cleaned her house. She is staying alone and she has no family support.

Please contact Derek at 84558203 if you would like to donate a preloved fridge (still in clean and working condition). Thank you so much! :)

Best regards,
Derek Lim

passiton.name: Black Mitsubishi Inverter Fridge MR V50
passiton.description: Black fridge about 420L. Good working order. It is about 5 years I think. But we are donating as we need a bigger fridge
passiton.location: Ang Mo Kio, Bishan, Braddell, Thomson

name: Fridge
description: Client is a 21-year-old single mother who has recently moved into a rental flat with her 1-year-old child. She is currently working full-time while pursuing part-time evening studies to upgrade her qualifications, with the aim of securing better financial stability to provide for her child. Due to her long working hours and caregiving responsibilities, access to a refrigerator is essential for safe storage of milk, baby food, and cooked meals, and would support her ability to manage daily caregiving and household needs effectively.

name: Queen-size bed frame
description:
Couple lives in a 2-room rental flat and is preparing to welcome a newborn. The mother, currently 4 months pregnant, is the main caregiver to her young child while her spouse works long hours as a security guard, the household’s only source of income. After covering rent and daily necessities, the family has limited means to furnish their home.

They currently have very minimal furniture and are seeking support for basic household items—a queen-sized bed frame, a wardrobe, and a TV console. These items will provide safe sleeping arrangements, proper storage, and a more functional living space, helping the family better manage daily routines and prepare for the baby’s arrival.

passiton.name: Queen Size Antique Rosewood Bed Frame with Display Shelves
passiton.description: Currently dismantled. In relatively good condition and able to come and view first. Antique rosewood material that holds strongly together for years.
passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview

name: Queen bed frame

Her children have been sharing a queen sized mattress to sleep on every night, which is currently on the floor with no bedframe. Client would like a new bedframe to place the mattress on. Please Whatsapp me at 62319407 if you have a suitable one to donate. Thank you.

name: Bicycle
description:
Sunbeam Place @ Children’s Society is requesting 2 medium-sized bicycles suitable for children aged 10 years and above.
These bicycles will be used to teach residents how to ride and for their general use.

Delivery will need to be arranged by the kind donor.
If you wish to contribute, please click “Donate”, and we will get in touch with you soon.

We sincerely thank you for your kindness and generosity in advance.
